Con el dinero de este préstamo podrá comprar 20 bolsas de abono orgánicos para fertilizar sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
Odilia is 31 years old and lives with her partner and the father of their 4 year old daughter. They live in their own house, which they both built in the native community Alto Incariado. She has farmed for 22 years and declared her business when she started her family. She plants coffee, bananas, corn, and cassava in the five plots of land granted to her by her community. The work is tiring, so staff is needed to successfully complete the field work. When this happens she must prepare meals for everyone. Odilia is happy with the results that her land gives her, so she is thinking about planting in greater numbers. To do this, she must invest in the purchase of small coffee plants and sacks of fertilizer. 

This is the fifth loan that she receives from MFP and she holds herself responsible to make her payments on time. She belongs to the community bank "Shantzoshis", a solid and cooperative group. 

With the money from this loan, she will be able to buy 20 sacks of organic fertilizer for her coffee crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.en:
Ramon has been a “habal-habal” (motorcycle taxi) driver for four years now. He is from Trinidad, Bohol. He also farms rice for additional income. 

He is 42 years old and married, with four children ages 6, 10, 13, and 21. He is sending his children to school so he works hard on his businesses to have a better income. 

He is asking for a loan to buy motorcycle parts and pay for repair of his motorcycle, like vulcanizing. His income will provide his family with daily food consumption and school fees.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts and pay for repair of his motorcycle, like vulcanizing.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 62 years old and from Trinidad, Bohol. She is married with eight grown children. Her husband works in the field as a farmer while she operates a sari-sari store in her neighborhood. 

She sells basic household items like shampoo, noodles, soy sauce, and snack food. This has been her business for fourteen years now.  

She is asking for a loan to be used as additional capital to buy toiletries, seasoning, canned goods, snack food, and spices. Her income will also help in looking after her grandchildren’s needs.

loans.use: to buy toiletries, seasoning, canned goods, snack food, and spices.

loans.name: Faccha Sisa

texts.es:
FACCHA SISA tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera, tiene un hijo de 2 años, Vive con el hijo y con los padres, en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar, en la fotografía esta acompañada de la sobrina.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

FACCHA SISA sisa se dedica a la venta de papas y pollos así como también cultiva maíz y papas,   la crianza de pollos y cerdos. 

Solicita el crédito para compra de pollos, cerdos, fertilizantes. Con el apoyo del crédito quiere tener sus propias cosas.

Realiza sus compras y ventas cada quince días en la ciudad de Guaranda.
El sueño de la señora es tener su propio negocio. El desafío al que la señora se enfrenta es la competencia.
En su tiempo libre le gusta jugar indor y disfrutar de los carnavales de Guaranda.
texts.en:
Faccha Sisa is nineteen years old and has a two-year-old son. She lives with her son and her parents in the city of Guaranda in Bolívar Province. In this picture, she is accompanied by her niece.

The Tagma Rumiñahui Communal Bank, located almost 25 minutes from the San Simón office, is made up of fourteen members who work in livestock and agriculture.

Faccha Sisa works selling potatoes and chickens, as well as growing corn and potatoes and raising chickens and pigs. She does her buying and selling every fifteen days in the city of Guaranda.

She is requesting this loan to purchase chickens, pigs, and fertilizers. With the support of this loan, she wants to have her own things; Faccha Sisa's dream is to have her own business. The challenge she faces is competition.

In her free time, she likes to play indoor soccer and enjoy Guaranda's carnivals.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, pigs, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 28 years old and lives in the town of Fort Portal in the Fort Portal region of Uganda. She is married and has 3 children with 2 of them currently in school. For the past 7 years, Mary has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells sugar and soap. 

To help expand her business, Mary has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more essential commodities like milk, bread, sugar and soap for resale, and will help Mary to generate greater profits and open up another shop. Mary hopes that in the future she will be able to own a big shop and get more profits. 

Mary is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Mary who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more essential commodities like milk

loans.name: Rosa Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa nació en el año 1989 y actualmente reside con sus dos hijos en la ciudad de Latacunga, en la Provincia de Cotopaxi . Latacunga está ubicada en el centro del Ecuador en las faldas del volcán activo más alto del mundo, el Cotopaxi, que ya ha destruido a la ciudad tres veces desde su fundación. En la ciudad se puede apreciar la arquitectura de la época colonial y sus habitantes se caracterizan por celebrar varias fiestas que contienen creencias de varias culturas como la “Mama Negra” que es una celebración originada con tradiciones africanas, indígenas y españolas.  
Rosa se dedica 6 horas al día desde hace doce años a su negocio que consiste en la venta de leche. A pesar del esfuerzo que ha puesto para ser padre y madre de sus dos hijos, se le es difícil conseguir los ingresos necesarios. Por lo tanto, ella tiene fe en que su negocio pueda crecer para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus dos hijos. Ella solicita un préstamo a Kiva para poder comprar otra vaca para su negocio, poder ser más eficiente, e incrementar sus ingresos. De esta forma, podrá crear un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa was born in 1989 and currently lives with her two children in the city of Latacunga, in Cotopaxi Province. Latacunga is located in the center of Ecuador on the flanks of Cotopaxi, the highest active volcano in the world, which has already destroyed the city three times since it was founded. In the city, one can observe colonial-era architecture; its inhabitants are known for celebrating several festivals based on the beliefs of various cultures, such as the "Mama Negra" [Black Mother], which is a celebration originating in African, indigenous, and Spanish traditions.

Rosa has worked six hours a day in her milk-selling business for twelve years. Despite the effort she puts into being both father and mother to her two children, it is hard for her to make enough money. She has faith that her business will be able to grow and provide a better quality of life for her two children. 

She is requesting a loan from Kiva to buy another cow for her business so she can be more efficient and increase her income. In that way, she will be able to create a better future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es: El socio Evaristo sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” y el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco y del departamento de Cusco. El socio Evaristo sigue trabajando como maestro de obras y sigue realizando diferentes tipos de construcción, arreglos de techos, pintar de casas. En esta oportunidad Evaristo requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo pinturas, clavos y fierros. El socio Evaristo está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The associate Evaristo continues belonging to the communal bank called "Always Together" and the bank is located in the district of Cusco of the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.  The associate Evaristo continues working as a foreman, doing different types of construction, ceiling arrangements, and house painting.  At this time, Evaristo requires the loan to buy construction materials, for example paint, nails and iron beams.  The associate Evaristo is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy contruction materials.

loans.name: Jordy Edgardo

texts.es:
El socio Jordy nació en la ciudad de Maranura de la provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. El socio Jordy tiene 19 años de edad y es soltero. 

El socio Jordy es albañil y trabajan en diferentes obras de construcción pero él está estudiando para postular  a la escuela de policías entonces él requiere el préstamo para pagar los trámites y hacer documentos para que pueda postular a la escuela antes mencionada.  

El socio Jordy agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The associate Jordy was born in the city of Maranura in the provice of La Convención, department of Cusco but lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. The associate Jordy is 19 years of age and single. 

The associate Jordy is a bricklayer and works in different types of construction, but he is studying to advance to the school for police officers.  He requires the loan to pay the tuition and book fees so that he can advance to the school before mentioned.  

The associate Jordy is grateful for the loan and promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: To pay tuition and book fees so that he can advance in the school before mentioned.

loans.name: Odinakhon

texts.ru: Одинахон 46 лет, вдова, имеет 3 детей, проживает с младшим сыном. Одинахон работает медсестрой в наркодиспансере города Ош, сын занимается изготовлением надгробных плит. В поисках дополнительного источника дохода Одинахон 10 лет назад начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве со стартовой суммы 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному  труду Одинахон она смогла построить дом для своей семьи.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Одинахон обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку 4 телок для разведения и получения молока.  Доходы от кредита Одинахон планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Odinakhon is 46 years old. She is a widow with three children and lives with her youngest son. Odinakhon works as a nurse in an outpatient clinic for drug addicts in the city of Osh. Her son makes gravestones. To supplement her income, 10 years ago Odinakhon started a livestock and small farming business with a start-up sum of 15,000 Kyrgyz soms (KGS) or approximately $317 USD. Thanks to her persistent efforts, Odinakhon was able to build a home for her family. To further develop her business, Odinakhon applied to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 135,000 KGS ($2875 USD) to purchase four calves for breeding and milking. Odinakhon plans to invest the loan in the future development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Janyl

texts.ru: Жаныл 38 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей, младшему сыну 4 года. Жаныл работает в местной регистрационной конторе и в качестве дополнительного источника дохода занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес  со стартовой суммы 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному  труду Жаныл ее хозяйство насчитывает 1 корову с теленком и 1 нетель,  а также 1 га земли с фасолью и перцем.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жаныл обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку 2 дойных коров.  Доходы от кредита Жаныл планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства, чтобы в будущем иметь возможность оплатить учебу своих детей в ВУЗах.
texts.en: Janyl is 48 years old. She is married and has four children. Her youngest son is four years old. Zhanyl works in the local registration office. To supplement her income, she has a livestock and small farming business started with 10,000 Kyrgyz soms (KGS) or approximately $212 USD. Thanks to her persistent efforts, Zhanyl now has a cow, calf, and heifer and one hectare of land growing beans and peppers. To further develop her business, Zhanyl applied to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 KGS ($2125) to purchase two milking cows. Zhanyl plans to invest the profits from her loan into the further development of her business. In the future she hopes to be able to pay for her children to get a university education.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Stellah

texts.en: Stellah is a married woman whose husband is an engineer. She has 2 children, ages 1 year and 9 years. She describes herself as a determined and focused woman. She operates a beauty salon where she provides hair services such as plaiting, blow drying, etc. Also she does manicures, pedicures, etc. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her business is located in a residential area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds for improving the business. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy beauty products. Her business goal is to expand her business and increase job opportunities for people within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will improve her beauty salon business.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Lidia Eulalia

texts.es:
Lidia es una mujer de 38 años que y vive con su esposo y cuatro hijos en Rio Verde, una parroquia en Santo Domingo. Santo Domingo es la cuarta ciudad más poblada del Ecuador y se ubica en la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas en la parte montañosa de la costa. En la ciudad hay abúndate movimiento comercial y el mercado ganadero es el más grande del país. La ciudad también se caracteriza por su biodiversidad, paisajes, y la comunidad indígena de los Tsáchilas. 
Lidia trabaja largas horas todos los días de la semana dedicándose a la crianza de cerdos. Lastimosamente, las pestes han afectado a algunos de sus animales y el ingreso del negocio no es suficiente para mantener a toda la familia. Por lo tanto, Lidia solicita un préstamo a Kiva para poder incrementar el número de cerdos y lograr prevenir que estos sean afectados por las pestes. De esta manera, ella logrará generar mayor ingresos para su familia, brindar la educación a sus hijos y tener una vida más digna.
texts.en:
Lidia is a 38-year-old woman who lives with her husband and four children in Rio Verde, a parish in Santo Domingo. Santo Domingo is the fourth most populated city in Ecuador and is located in Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas Province in the mountainous part of the coast. In the city there is abundant commercial traffic and the livestock market is the largest in the country. The city is also known for its biodiversity, scenery, and the Tsáchilas indigenous community.

Lidia works long hours every day of the week raising pigs. Unfortunately, disease has affected some of her animals and her business income is not enough to take care of the whole family. For that reason, Lidia is requesting a loan from Kiva so she can increase her number of pigs and prevent them from being affected by the disease. This way, she will be able to generate greater income for her family, provide her children with education, and have a more decent life.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Donald

texts.en:
Donald is 42 years old and married with one child. He works hard to provide for his family. He runs a charcoal retail business in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.
Donald has borrowed and paid back eight loans from NWTF before this loan. He has been running his charcoal retail business for five years and also earns an income from motorcycle transport and buying and selling rice.
Donald aspires to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Frolide

texts.en:
Frolide is 34 years old. She has six children aged between three and seven, all of whom go to school. 
Frolide has been a businesswoman since 1990. She sells rice and cooking oil. With this loan, she will buy more rice and cooking oil. The profits from her business will be put aside as savings.

loans.use: to buy more rice and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Ananrkul

texts.ru: Анаркул 41 год, замужем, имеет  детей, младшей дочке 1 год. Анаркул в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством, начав этот бизнес  с обработки 1, 25 га земли. Благодаря упорному  труду Анаркул в ее хозяйстве на сегодня 2,07 га земли, где она выращивает фасоль и картофель.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анаркул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку семян фасоли, ГСМ и удобрения.  Доходы от кредита Анаркул планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства, чтобы в будущем иметь возможность оплатить учебу своих детей в ВУЗах.
texts.en: Ananrkul is 41 years old. She is married with children. Her youngest daughter is one year old. Ananrkul farms to provide the main source of income for her family, having started her business with 1.25 hectares of land. Thanks to her persistent efforts, Ananrkul now has 2.07 hectares of land where she grows beans and potatoes. To further develop her business, Ananrkul applied to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 50,000 Kyrgyz soms (KGS) or $1075 to purchase bean seeds, fuel and fertilizer. She plans to invest the profits from her loan into the further development of her business, so that in the future she can pay for her children to attend university.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fuel and fertilizer

loans.name: Berenice

texts.es: Berenice de 41 años de edad, vive al sur de la ciudad con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 9 a 17 años. Allí en el municipio de Puerto Colombia, a orillas del mar, tiene una tienda que inició desde hace 5 años,  aprovechando un local desocupado; cerca a su negocio no hay otro que le haga competencia y hay un importante potencial de ventas que Berenice no alcanza a abastecer, pues su capital de trabajo se torna insuficiente, cuando va a surtir, debido a que hay productos que rotan muy rápidamente y entonces debe ir nuevamente a mercar, incrementado los gastos de transporte y muchas veces dejando a su clientela no muy satisfecha. En su hogar su esposo trabaja, con una prestigiosa universidad en su sede campestre; además del negocio de tienda Berenice, también vende fritos todas las tardes, en un sector muy concurrido del municipio, donde ofrece empanadas, carimañolas (un amasijo de yuca relleno de carne, queso o pollo que se consume frito.) arepas con huevo, papas rellenas y la especialidad de la casa que es “la arepa rellena de carne con huevo”; para el desarrollo de este último negocio, es apoyada por su cuñada en la tienda,  mientras Berenice está en la fritanguería. Su meta mas adelante es ampliar su tienda,  tener un surtido diversificado y convertirla en un autoservicio bien organizado. Mientras esto ocurre Berenice trabaja con gran esfuerzo  obteniendo un margen de utilidad no menor del 20% una rotación de inventarios de 18 días, indicadores financieros desde los cuales proyectamos su crecimiento. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ranchos, víveres, carnes, abarrotes en mayor cantidad, con lo cual aumentará su surtido aprovechando las necesidades de su clientela potencial, para desarrollar con éxito un trabajo persistente en su tienda.
texts.en: Berenice, 41, lives with her partner and their three children, 9-17, in the south of city. She has a store that she opened 5 years ago in the town of Puerto Colombia, on the seashore.  She found an unoccupied space with no competition nearby.  There is an important sales potential that Berenice hasn’t been able to capture since she doesn’t have enough working capital. When she needs to restock, since there are products that turn over quickly, she must again go to buy, raising the transport costs and often leaving her customers unsatisfied.  Her husband works in the home town at a prestigious university at the country campus.  Besides the store Berenice also sells fried food every afternoon in a busy area of the town where she offers empanadas (stuffed pies) carimañolas (yucca meal stuffed with meat, cheese or chicken that are eaten fried), arepas with eggs (typical Colombian pancake-like item), stuffed potatoes, and the specialty of the house “meat stuffed arepas with eggs”.  Her sister-in-law helps her with this part of the business by being in the store while Berenice is doing the frying.  Her future goal is to enlarge her store, have diversified products and convert it into a well-organized self-service establishment.  Until this happens Berenice works with a lot of effort to obtain a margin of no less than 20% and a turnover of inventory of 18 days, financial indicators that will project her growth.  Now she is applying for a Kiva loan, the first that she will have with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation and she will use it to buy food, provisions, meat, and groceries in large quantities with which she will increase her stock.  These will be directed at the necessities of her potential customers, so that she can have a consistent amount of business in her store.

loans.use: to buy provisions, food, meat, and groceries

loans.name: Nurkyz

texts.ru: Нуркыз 36 лет, замужем, имеет  4 детей, младшей дочке 2 года. Нуркыз в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес  в 1992 году с суммы в 10,000 сом. Благодаря упорному  труду Нуркыз в ее хозяйстве на сегодня 2 коровы, 50 овец и 4 га земли, где она выращивает фасоль, картофель и многолетние травы, служащие кормом для скота.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуркыз обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку семян фасоли, ГСМ и удобрения.  Доходы от кредита Нуркыз планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства, чтобы в будущем иметь возможность оплатить учебу своих детей в ВУЗах.
texts.en: Nurkyz is 36 years old. She is married with four children. Her youngest daughter is two years old. Nurkyz farms and raises livestock as the primary source of income for her family. She started her business in 1992 with 10,000 Kyrgyz soms (KGS) or approximately $212 USD. Thanks to her persistent efforts, Nurkyz now has two cows, 50 sheep and four hectares of land where she grows beans, potatoes and the perennial grasses that feed her herd. To further develop her business, Nurkyz applied to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 50,000 KGS ($1075) to buy bean seeds, fuel and fertilizer. Nurkyz plans to invest the profits from her loan into the development of her business, so that in the future she can afford to send her children to study at university.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fuel and fertilizer

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda tiene 57 años de edad, es casada y vive junto a su conyugue y a su madre en el distrito de Cayaltí, una zona agrícola y comercial ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de queso, huevos, aceitunas y embutidos en uno de los mercados de la zona en donde reside. Su negocio encuentra bastante acogida debido a que los productos que ofrece son de consumo diario, especialmente en el desayuno de los hogares de la zona. La calidad de los productos que ofrece y el buen trato que brinda a sus clientes le han hecho conocida en la zona. Con los ingresos de esta actividad de encarga de ayudar a su esposo a sacar adelante a su familia.

Hilda desea adquirir más mercadería como queso huevos y salchicha para ampliar su negocio y sus ventas ya que la demanda esta aumentando. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer bastante trabajadora y responsable, ha tenido créditos anteriormente con nuestra institución y ha demostrado ser una buena cliente. Hilda agradece de antemano a las personas de Kiva que le ayudarán con su crédito.
texts.en:
Hilda is 57 years of age, married and lives with her husband and mother in the Cayaltí district, a commercial and agricultural zone located one hour from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

She has been dedicated for 10 years to the sale of cheese, eggs, olives and sausages in one of the markets of the zone where she resides.  Her business is well received due to the products that she offers for daily consumption, especially for breakfast, in the homes of the area.  The quality of the products that she offers and the good deals that she offers her clients are a well-known fact in the area.  With the income from this activity she takes care of helping her husband to move their family ahead.  

Hilda would like to acquire more merchandise such as cheese, eggs and sausage to grow her business and her sales now that demand is growing.  Because of this she has found it convenient to request a loan of 2000 new soles from Edpyme Alternative to help her to achieve her objective.  

She is a very hard-working and responsible woman.  She has had loans before with our institution and has demonstrated herself to be a good client.  Hilda is grateful in advance to the people of Kiva who will help her with her loan.

loans.use: to acquire more merchandise such as cheese, eggs and sausage to expand her business.

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en:
Kennedy is 33 years old and is from Naivasha. He is married with two children who both go to school.
Kennedy has a bakery business. He sells different types of snacks, and has been doing this for the past 12 years. He has applied for his first loan from Kiva partner KADET, to enable him to buy cooking ingredients such as eggs, milk, baking flour and sugar, which he will use to increase his stock. He hopes to open a big bakery shop in the near future.

loans.use: to buy eggs, milk, baking flour and sugar for his business.

loans.name: Dyna

texts.en:
Dyna is a 25-year-old married woman with two children aged one and three. Her husband is a fisherman.
Dyna has run a sari-sari store business for almost two years now. She sells coffee, sugar, shampoo, soap and snack foods. She also sells fresh fish to her community. Dyna works hard to increase her income and save for her children's future education. She has requested this loan to buy fish and more items to sell such as canned goods and toiletries. This loan will help increase Dyna's sales.

loans.use: to buy fish and more items to sell such as canned goods and toiletries.

loans.name: Krikor

texts.en:
Krikor is a 59-year-old Lebanese married man who lives with his wife and two children. Despite his older age, he is working very hard to satisfy his family's needs. He specializes in producing stamps and souvenirs for special occasions such as medal, trophies etc. He owns a shop in his town where he sells his items at good prices. He has been involved in this type of business for the past 40 years. 
In order to boost the family’s income, Krikor's wife decided to start working on her own as a tailor. She is a talented tailor and has been able to acquire a good number of customers in a short period due to her friendly personality and skills. 
Today, Krikor is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a quantity of copper in order to proceed with his business operation efficiently. He states that the loan will certainly help him extend his trade and increase his income by a large percentage. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans to further develop his work.

loans.use: to purchase the required quantity of copper.

loans.name: Suyun

texts.ru: Суйун 53 года, замужем, имеет  4 детей. Суйун работает в статистическом комитете и в  качестве дополнительного источника дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес  в 2007 году с суммы в 14,000 сом. Благодаря упорному  труду Суйун в ее хозяйстве на сегодня 5 коров, 5 лошадей и 1,2 га земли, где она выращивает многолетние травы, служащие кормом для скота.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Суйун обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота  - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Суйун планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Suyun is 53 years old and married with four children. Suyun works at the statistics commission and also farms and raises livestock to supplement her income. She started her business in 2007 with 14,000 Kyrgyz soms (KGS) or approximately $296 USD. Thanks to her persistent efforts, Suyun now has five cows, five horses and 1.2 hectares of land where she grows perennial grasses to feed her herd. To further develop her business, Suyun applied to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 50,000 KGS ($1075) to purchase young cattle. Suyun plans to invest the profits from her loan into the further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Aun

texts.en:
Aun is a hardworking woman who owns and manages her farm by planting rice. She is 40 years old and is a mother who takes cares of four single children, three of whom attend local schools. Aun has the help of her husband and some of her children in the business, especially during the rainy season when there is lots of farm work to do. She has been in this business for more than 20 years and earns approximately USD $5 per day.
In order to make improvements in her farming and ensure good growth for her crops, Aun would like to take a loan of KHR 1,500,000 to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for her rice crops. Aun hopes that she will be able to make a fruitful harvest with the help of this loan. In the future, she hopes to renovate and expand her house.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for her rice crops.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 29 years old and is married to Cyrus Ndambuki who is a carpenter. The are blessed with one child.
Elizabeth provides additional income for the family. She has been running a retail shop for four years and earns a monthly income of 10,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). Her loan will be used to purchase additional stock such as tea leaves, Royco (instant soup), and soft drinks for her business.The anticipated profits will be used to expand her business to a wholesale business.
This is Elizabeth's first loan from Kiva partner KADET. Her hopes and dream for the future are to educate her children through her expanded business and to be financially secure.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock such as tea leaves, royco, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Nazar

texts.ru: Назар житель района Пяндж. Ему 50 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Сам Назар при доме имеет участок земли, где занимается посевом зернобобовых культур. Этим видом деятельности занимается 23 года. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений, семян кукурузы и бобов.
texts.en: Nazar lives in Pyandj. He is 50 years old and married with three children. His wife works on a privately owned commercial "dekhan" farm. Nazar owns a plot of land near his house where he grows beans. He has been farming for 23 years. He has applied for a loan to purchase fertilizer and seeds for corn and beans.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and corn and bean seeds

loans.name: Rulabiem

texts.en:
Rulabiem is a seaweed farmer from Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married with two children aged one and three. Her husband is a fisherman and a seaweed farmer too. They help each other in this work in order to provide for their children. 
Rulabiem is asking for a loan to buy supplies such as plastic rope and wooden stakes and to pay for boat maintenance. She hopes that someday she can send her children to college so they can have a good future.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as plastic rope and wooden stakes, and pay for boat maintenance.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 30 years old. She is married to a businessman and has one child. With this loan, she wants to buy more cassava and rice for resale. The profits from her business will be used for savings.

loans.use: to buy more cassava and rice for resale.

loans.name: Murodali

texts.ru: Муродали житель района Пяндж. Ему 38 лет. Он женат. Муродали более восьми лет занимается растениеводством. Он в основном выращивает овощи и бахчевые культуры. Кредит берет для закупа семян.
texts.en: Murodali is a resident of the Pyandj region.  He is 38 years old.  He is married.  Murodali has worked in agriculture for more then eight years. He mostly grows vegetables and melons.  He is taking out a loan to purchase seeds.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Teopista

texts.en:
Teopista is 31 years old and lives in the town of Fort Portal in the Fort Portal region of Uganda. She is married and has two children, one of whom is currently in school. For the past two years, Teopista has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells sugar and soap. 
To help expand her business, Teopista has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from Kiva partner BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more essential commodities such as milk, bread, sugar and soap for resale, and will help Teopista to generate greater profits and stock more goods to attract more customers. Teopista hopes that in the future she will be able to open another shop. 
Teopista is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Teopista who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for micro-loans.

loans.use: to buy more essential commodities such as milk, bread, sugar and soap for resale.

loans.name: Silvana

texts.en: Silvana is 49 years old, married and has seven children. Her husband is a carpenter. Silvana has owned a sari-sari store for three years now. She sells basic household goods such as canned goods, toiletries, seasoning, cooking oil, vinegar, coffee and milk sachets. She is asking for a loan to buy sacks of rice, feed and canned goods. Her income will help keep her children in school and it is a great help to her carpenter husband in raising their family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, feed and canned goods.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a married woman. She has two children aged three and nine. She describes herself as an honest, outgoing and caring woman. She operates a food stall where she sells snacks such as doughnuts, cakes etc. She has been involved in this business for five years and employs two staff members. Her business is located in a strategic business environment where there is a lot of demand for snacks and her primary customers are shopkeepers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of ingredients for preparing snacks. 
Edna will use her loan of 20,000 KES to buy food ingredients for preparing snacks for selling. Her business goal is to be a supplier of snacks within five years. She hopes that in the future she will be financially stable in her business.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients for preparing snacks for selling.

loans.name: Jesús Manuel

texts.es:
Jesús es un padre de familia de 42 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus cuatro hijos en uno de los caseríos que conforman la parte rural del distrito de Sullana, en la región Piura. En la zona donde reside solo cuenta con energia electrica.

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, caprino y porcino en su domicilio, allí los cria, engorda y comercializa en el mercado local, el cuenta con mas de seis años de experiencia en el manejo de su negocio y conoce el rubro a la perfección, si bien es cierto cuenta con bastante competencia en la zona, el mercado para su actividad también es amplio.

Jesús desea adquirir alimentos balanceados con los cuales pueda alimentar de mejor modo a sus animales y obtener mejores precios por sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los cuales podrá lograr su objetivo, crecerá como empresario y mejorará su calidad de vida.

El ya ha tenido créditos anteriormente con nuestra institución y ha demostrado ser un cliente puntual y responsable. Jesús agradece a las personas que colaborarán con el a traves de Kiva.
texts.en:
Jesús is a 42 year-old family head who lives with his wife and four children in one of the hamlets that make up the rural part of the district of Sullana in the Piura region. This is an area where the only service people have is electricity.

He works raising sheep, goats and pigs at his house. There he raises, fattens and sells them at a local market. He has had more than six years of experience running his business and knows the ins and outs perfectly. Although it is true that he has lots of competition in the area, there is also a big market for livestock 

Jesús wants to acquire nutritional feed to better feed his animals and earn higher prices when he sells. Consequently, he believed it expedient to request a loan for S/. 1,500 from Edpyme Alternativa. He will use it to achieve his goals of growing as a businessman and improving his quality of life.

He has had previous loans with our field partner and has demonstrated that he is a punctual and responsible client. Jesús thanks the people who will collaborate with him through KIVA.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed to improve his business raising and selling animals.

loans.name: Dani

texts.en:
Dani is a 22-year-old single man living with one parent and his only sibling. He is from Lebanon. After his father’s death, Dani felt very responsible for his family and had to work relentlessly in order to support his family financially. In 2009, he opened his own shop where he sells car spare parts. His supplies are used in different types of cars. 
This will be Dani's second Kiva loan and he notes that he was very thankful for the results achieved due to the previous loan. Today, he is requesting a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase additional spare parts in order to satisfy his customers' demands and provide them with top quality services. Dani is very optimistic, ambitious and always seeks the best; and this is the reason why he is making a great effort in his professional career to progress and improve his finances.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts.

loans.name: Oydinoy

texts.ru: Ойдиной проживает в районе Пяндж. Ей 47 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она вместе со всей семьей занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности она занимается десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян кукурузы.
texts.en: Oydinoy lives in the Pyandj region.  She is 47 years old.  She is married.  She has three children.  Together with her family she works in agriculture.  She has worked in this area for ten years.  She is taking out a loan to purchase fertilizer and corn seeds.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and corn seeds

loans.name: Santos Edgardo

texts.es:
Santos tiene 39 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia, la cual esta ubicada en uno de los caseríos que conforman la parte rural del distrito de Tambogrande, en la región Piura. 
La actividad que desarrolla es la crianza de ovejas, cabras, cerdos y aves de corral, el cuenta con los conocimientos necesarios para brindar una adecuada alimentación a sus animales. Esta actividad la desarrolla desde hace 10 años. También se desempeña como peón agrícola en parcelas aledañas. Con estas actividades se hace cargo del sostenimiento económico de su familia.
Santos desea adquirir más animales y alimento balanceado para ampliar su negocio de crianza y venta, también desea mejorar el corral de los mismos. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que contribuyan al logro de su objetivo.
Santos cuenta con muchas ganas se salir adelante y ayudar a los suyos, por eso siempre se esfuerza por lograrlo, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Santos is 39 years old, married and has four dependent children. He lives in his own house which is located in one of the hamlets that make up the rural part of the district of Tambogrande in the Piura region,

He raises sheep, goats and poultry. He has the knowledge necessary to provide adequate nutrients to his animals. He has run his business for 10 years. He also works as an agricultural laborer on neighboring farms. With these jobs, he takes responsibility for supporting his family economically.

Santos wants to acquire more animals and nutritional feed in order to expand his livestock business. He also wants to improve his animals’ corral. Consequently he has found it expedient to request a loan of S/. 1,500 from Edpyme Alternative. The loan will enable him to achieve his objectives.

Santos has really wanted to get ahead and help his family. Thus he always works hard and people who know him have great esteem and affection for him.

loans.use: to acquire more animals and nutritional feed to expand his business raising and selling livestock.

loans.name: Elaine

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Elaine;La socia continua con su negocio de venta de repuestos de moto,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio, a la vez la socia continua tejiendo chompas,chalinas chuyos entre otros, vendiendo a sus amistades,clientes y en las disttinatas ferias que se realizan,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de materiales para su negocio como lanas de diferente color.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Elaine continues with her business of selling motorcycle replacement parts.  She has been in this business for a good amount of time.  It is going well for her thanks to the daily effort that she puts into her business.

She also continues knitting sweaters, scarves, and hats, among others.  She sells to her friends and customers at the different fairs that are held.  She is a responsible and hard-working person with a great desire to continue working for her family.

Elaine is requesting the loan to buy materials like different colors of wool for her business.  She is grateful for the loan she was granted, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy different colors of wool for her business.

loans.name: Nilyufar

texts.ru: Нилюфар сельская женщина 34 лет.Замужем,имеет 3 детей.Ee муж занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур,сеет рис,кукурузу и пшеницу.А также у них имеются несколько поголовья скота.Дома реализуют кисломолочные продукты и продают соседям.Нилюфар очень пунктуальная,трудолюбивая женщина.Кроме реализации кисломолочных продуктов у нее также имеется магазин где она продает детскую одежду,и ткани для пошива женской одежды.По бизнесу помогают ей ее дети .С 2010 года кредитуется в нашей организации.Сейчас на полученный кредит она хочет приобрести детскую одежду и летних тканей для пошива женской одежды чтобы расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Nilyufar is a 34 year old village woman.  She is married and has 3 children.  Her husband grows agricultural crops; he plants rice, corn and wheat.  They also have several heads of livestock.  At home they make dairy products and sell them to neighbors.  Nilyufar is a very punctual, hardworking woman.  In addition to making dairy products she has a store where she sells children's clothing and fabrics for sewing women's clothing.  Her children help her in her business.  She has been taking loans from our organization since 2010.  Now she would like to use the loan to buy children's clothing and summer fabrics for sewing women's clothing in order to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing and fabrics for women's clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more items like cloth

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия проживает в районе Пяндж. Ей 43 года. Она замужем. Ее муж работает в России. Сама она занимается растениеводством, в основном она выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Zulfiya lives in the Pyandj region.  She is 43 years old.  She is married.  Her husband works in Russia.  Zulfiya works in agriculture, mostly she grows vegetables.  She has been in this business for five years.  She is taking out a loan to purchase fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “RICCHARY ANTEÑA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Izcuchaca, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maruja; la socia continua con su negocio de restaurante ,la socia trabaja en su negocio desde las 09:00am hasta las 07:00pm aproximadamente,la socia vende almuerzos en su restaurante ,la socia lleva años en su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como arroz y aceite.
texts.en:
Maruja belongs to the “RICCHARY ANTEÑA” communal bank. The bank is located in the Izcuchaca district, which belongs to the Anta province of the Cusco department.

Maruja continues with her restaurant business.  She works in her business from 9:00 a.m. until approximately 7:00 p.m.  She sells lunches at her restaurant.  She has been in her business for years.  It is going well for her thanks to the hard-work that she puts into her business.

Maruja is a responsible person with a great desire to continue working for her family.

Maruja is requesting the loan to buy supplies like rice and cooking oil for her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies like rice and cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia invirtió su primer credikiva en la compra de mercancías variadas como sábanas, calzado, bolsos, porductos cosméticos, entre otros para la venta a crédito y en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de los pudines y panes que ofrece.  Esta vez, Silvia recurre a su segundo financiamiento con kiva, a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar un horno de panadería ya que sus productos tienen muy buena acogida y sus clientes le piden cada vez más, razón por la cual no puede seguir haciéndolos de manera casera y requiere tecnificarse y mejorar su calidad. Envía un mensaje a sus financiadores asi:  “Les doy gracias de todo corazón por el crédito otorgado y la facilidad para el pago de las cuotas, el crédito me ayudó a mejorar mis ganancias”
texts.en:
Silvia invested her first Kiva loan in the purchase of a variety of merchandise, such as sheets, footwear, bags and cosmetic products, among others, to re-sell on credit, and in the purchase of supplies to make the puddings and breads that she sells. This time, Silvia is turning to Kiva for her second funding through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to purchase a baker’s oven because her products have been very well received and her customers keep asking for more. That is why she can no longer continue making them in an amateurish way and needs to use modern technology and improve quality. 

Silva sends this message to her lenders: “I thank you with all my heart for the loan you have given me and for the easy payments. The loan helped me improve my profits.”

loans.use: to purchase a baker's oven.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: Domingo se encuentra muy satisfecho porque con su credikiva anterior pudo comprar gaseosas, jugos, cervezas al por mayor y con un mayor inventario logró aumentar sus ventas por cajas a negocios ubicados alrededor del suyo. En la actualidad está aplicando a su segundo financieminto porque quiere hacer unas reformas locativas, para que sus clientes encuentren en su sala de billar un ambiente confortable.Domingo envia el siguiente mensaje a los finaciadores de Kiva: " Con su apoyo he podido tener una mejor ganancia y con esto pude empezar a cumplir los objetivos  y metas propuestas, por eso quiero seguir dandoles mis agradecimientos  a todas las personas que hacen posible esto. "
texts.en: Domingo is very satisfied because with his previous CrediKiva, he was able to buy soft drinks, juices, and beers wholesale. With a better inventory, he was able to increase his sales of cases to businesses located near his own. He is currently applying for a second loan because he wants to remodel his billiard hall to provide his customers with a comfortable atmosphere. Domingo sends the following message to Kiva lenders: "With your support, I have been able to increase my income, which has allowed me to begin to achieve my stated goals and objectives. I would like to continue to express my thanks to all of the people who make this possible."

loans.use: to invest in remodeling his place of business

loans.name: Mirzo

texts.ru: Мирзо трудолюбивый и добрый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Он вместе с супругой Мукаррам работал на рынке. Они продавали мужскую одежду. Этим занимался более 5 лет. После того как Мирзо приобрел машину он начал заниматься предоставлением услуги такси по местному маршруту. Теперь он занимается этим бизнесом, а его заботливая жена продолжает продажу мужских одежд. Мирзо хотел бы получить займ для покупки стройматериалов для ремонта своего дома. Мирзо и его любящая жена надеются на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Mirzo is a hardworking and kind fellow. He is married and is raising one child. He and his wife Mukarram used to work at the market, where they sold men's clothing. He was involved in this business for more than five years. After Mirzo acquired a car, he began to offer taxi services along a local route. Now he is in the taxi business, and his caring wife continues to to sell men's clothing. Mirzo would like a loan to purchase building materials for repairing their home. Mirzo and his loving wife are counting on your help and kindness.

loans.use: To purchase building materials

loans.name: Fany

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de promotora de espectaculos,ella trae grupos musicales para diferentes eventos y tambien la socia sigue teniendo su quinta restaurant donde hace platos como desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de estos negocios la socai quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar su quinta restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo,carne y verduras y tambien para comprar gaseosas y cervezas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower still has her business as a show promoter; she brings in musical groups for various events. She also still has her restaurant, where she makes dishes such as breakfasts, lunches and dinners. She works from 8:00am to 6:00pm. 

She wants to succeed through these businesses. Her dream is to expand and improve her restaurant. The borrower is requesting the loan in order to buy cooking supplies such as chicken, meat and vegetables, and also to buy soft drinks and beer.


She is happy about the loan and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy cooking supplies such as chicken, meat and vegetables, and also to buy soft drinks and beer.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.en: For fifteen years now, Teodoro has been engaged in rice farming and buying and selling herbal products in the town of Trinidad, Bohol. He is 43 years old and married. Teodoro would like to ask for a loan to buy farm supplies, like fertilizer and insecticides, as well as herbal products. This will help so he can produce a better yield on his crops and make a good income out of his hard work. His harvest will also provide food for his family’s consumption. A loan will make a difference in his farming and direct-selling business.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies, like fertilizer and insecticides, as well as herbal products

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en: Edwin is a carpenter from Trinidad, Bohol. He is 22 years old and a married man with a 4-year-old child. He works hard to provide for his family's basic needs. He also hopes to save for his child's future education. Edwin requested this loan to purchase more wood and supplies for his carpentry business. In the future, Edwin hopes for his family to have a more stable living.

loans.use: To purchase more wood and supplies

loans.name: Rosalbina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “RICHARY ANTEÑA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosalbina; La socia continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,azucar,leche,golosinas,gaseosas entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio ,la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como gaseosas. 



                                                                                                                La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the "Richary Anteña" communal bank, located in Anta district, which is part of Anta province in Cusco department. The borrower is Rosalbina. 

She still has her grocery store business. She sells various kinds of products such as rice, sugar, milk, candy and other items. 

The borrower has had her shop for some time, and it is going well, thanks to the effort she puts into her business.

The borrower is a responsible person with a strong desire to keep working for the sake of her family. 

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise such as soft drinks. The borrower is happy about the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as soft drinks.

loans.name: Sabban's Group

texts.en:
Sabban has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for her livestock business. With the loan, she will buy a young buffalo. She will raise it and sell it for a profit.

Her husband is a farmer by profession and sells agricultural goods like wheat and rice to earn money for the family.

Sabban has given birth to a son and two daughters. Her son left his education after primary school, while her daughters are illiterate.

Her brother also lives with her and her family. He is also in the wheat and rice selling business.

Sabban is a very active and efficient lady and performs her household duties very well along with her business activities.

She is confident that her business will get more success after using the loan.

Note: In the photo, the lady is holding a book called "Asasah passbook is Sabban."

loans.use: To buy a buffalo for her livestock business

loans.name: Erasma

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de jugos,ella vende diferente tipos de jugos como jugo de fresa,jugo de naranja entre jugos,la socia trabaja en elmercado desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de jugos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar frutas como manzanas,fresas,papaya y azucar al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower still has her juice stand. She sells various kinds of juices such as strawberry juice, orange juice and other juices. She works in the market from 8:00am to 6:00pm. 

By means of this business she is raising her children. Her dream is to expand her juice stand. She is applying for the loan to buy at wholesale, fruit such as apples, strawberries and papaya, as well as sugar. 

The borrower is happy about the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy at wholesale, fruit such as apples, strawberries and papaya, as well as sugar.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “RICHARY ANTEÑA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladys;La socia continua con su negocio de venta de frutas,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone  a su negocio,la socia tambien continua con su negocio de venta de salchipapas,la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar adelante por su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mas frutas como platanos y manzanas. 
                                                        
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gladys belongs to the "Richary Anteña" communal bank, located in the district of Anta, province of Anta, department of Cusco.
Gladys is continuing with her fruit sales business. She has had this business for some time now, and it is going well thanks to her hard work. She is also continuing to sell salchipapas [fried potatoes with hot dog]. She is a responsible person with a great desire to keep moving forward for the sake of her family.
She is requesting this loan for the purchase of more fruit such as bananas and apples.
She is happy to have this loan and promises to repay it.

loans.use: to buy more fruit, such as bananas and apples.

loans.name: Diana Karolina

texts.es: Diana de 24 años de edad, es la propietaria de un taller de confecciones, ubicado en el municipio de Puerto Colombia, donde vive con su esposo y su hijo de 8 meses de nacido. Ella aprendió este oficio de manera autodidacta, empleando una vieja máquina de coser familiar que le regaló un pariente y posteriormente fue perfeccionándose técnicamente a través de cursos del SENA, Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje, y aun hoy hace cursos a través del internet . La clientela de Diana se encuentra en Puerto Colombia, municipio a orillas del mar muy cerca a la ciudad de Barranquilla, donde tiene su taller y habita. Ella manifiesta que sus épocas de temporadas altas se concentran en el mes de Diciembre y allí contrata operarias en el proceso de corte, para responderle efectivamente a su clientela. Como cada vez mas crece su clientela y aumentan las exigencias de calidad, Diana está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una fileteadora industrial de segunda y materiales como telas, hilos, aplicaciones y accesorios, para desarrollar nuevos diseños ajustados a la moda y a los pedidos de su exquisita clientela.
texts.en: Diana is 24 and owns a sewing workshop located in the Puerto Colombia municipality, where she lives with her husband and 8-month-old baby. She taught herself to sew using an old family sewing machine given to her by a relative. Later, she took a course from SENA, the Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje (National Apprenticeship Service) and perfected her technique. She now takes courses on the internet. Diana's customers live in Puerto Colombia, where she lives and has her workshop. Puerto Colombia is a municipality on the seashore very close to the city of Barranquilla. She says that the busy season for her is in December, at which time she hires workers for processing in order to serve her clients effectively. As her customer base keeps growing and demanding quality, Diana is requesting a Kiva loan, her first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy a second-hand industrial sewing machine as well as items such as thread, fabric, applications and accessories in order to make more designs in keeping with current fashions and her customers' orders.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de elaboracion y venta de panes,al socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,ella vende en forma ambulatoria,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los panes.La socia solicita el crecito para comprar insumos como harina,mantequilla,huevos y azucar al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues with the business of manufacturing and selling bread; she works from 8am until 6pm and she sells from place to place.  By means of this business she wants to continue moving forward.  Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell the bread.  She's asking for the loan to buy ingredients like flour, butter, eggs and sugar at wholesale.  She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy baking supplies.

loans.name: Duo Cipresales Group

texts.es: Duo Cipresales. Este Duo esta integrado por doña Marta Herlinda,ella se dedica a la elavoracion de tejidos tipicos a mano, desde hace varios años,ella se califica como una persona muy luchadora ya que dia a dia lucha para ayudar a su familia y poco a poco ir saliendo adelante,nos cuenta que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima, (hilo)para la confeccion de tejidos tipicos.espera que le puedan ayudar para que ella pueda seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Cipresales Duo.

This Duo is composed by Marta Herlinda who has been making hand-made traditional fabric for several years.  She self-identifies as a very tenacious person who strives daily to help her family and little by little get ahead.  She tells us that she's asking for this loan to buy raw materials (thread) to make traditional fabric.  She hopes that you will be able to help her so that she can continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to weave traditional fabric.

loans.name: Nathaly Karina

texts.es:
NATHALY KARINA tiene 23 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos, vive en casa con sus padres en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

NATHALY KARINA es estudiante trabaja en los tiempos libres en un bar. Solicita el crédito para poder comprar un computador con impresora.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que le hacìa falta para poder realizar los trabajos de la universidad.
la compra lo hará en guaranda. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la falta de dinero para realizar la compra.

El sueño es poder culminar la carrera. En el tiempo libre le gusta leer y dibujar.
texts.en:
Nathaly Karina is 23, single, and has no children. She lives in her parents' home in Guaranda, Bolivar province.
She is a student and works in a bar during her free time. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of a computer and printer.
This loan will help her to be able to buy what she needs for her university studies.
She will make the purchase in Guaranda. She has encountered a challenge: the lack of funds for making the purchase.
Her dream is to finish her studies. In her free time, she likes to read and draw.

loans.use: to buy a computer and printer.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “RICHARY ANTEÑA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Teofila;La socia continua con su negocio de venta de carne y leche,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,la socia a la vez continua dedicandose a la ganaderia ,la socia compra y vende sus ganados en una de las ferias que se realiza los dias viernes,la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de un ganado para su negocio.
                                                     
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “RICHARY ANTEÑA” communal bank located in Anta District belonging to Anta Province and Cusco Department.

The member is Teofila who continues with her business selling meat and milk.  She's been in this business for years and does well thanks to the effort she puts into her business.  At the same time she continues raising livestock.  She buys and sells her livestock at one of the livestock fairs that takes place on Fridays.  She is a responsible person who very much wants to continue working for her family.

She requests the loan to buy a head of cattle for her business.  She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Stella

texts.fr: Revendeuse d’ustensiles de cuisine, objets en plastique et pagnes depuis 2005 à domicile, Madame Stella est mariée. Elle envoisine la quarante deuxième année et est maman de 3 adorables enfants tous à l’école. Le premier âgé de 10ans et le dernier 05ans. Elle vend ses marchandises à toutes personnes et s’approvisionne chez les grossistes au grand marché de Lomé. Elle sollicite ce premier crédit de WAGES pour acheter plus de marchandises afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Elle veut ajouter la vente des produits de premières nécessités et assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille. Son conjoint est électricien.
texts.en: Stella is a married lady who has been selling kitchen utensils, plastic goods and 'pagnes' (traditional wraps) from her home since 2005.  She is approaching her 42nd birthday and is mom to three adorable children who are all in school.  Her eldest is 10 years old and her youngest is 5.  Stella sells merchandise to the general public and stocks up at the wholealers in the main market in Lomé.  She is requesting her first loan from WAGES to buy more merchandise so that she can better serve her customers' needs.  She would like to start selling staple goods in addition to her other products and guarantee her family's basic needs.  Her husband is an electrician.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils and plastic goods

loans.name: Rosa Beatriz

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de pescado y pollo y tambien se dedica al negocio de cultivo de maiz,ella tiene una tierra de cultivo donde siembra maiz y lo vende en las diferentes ferias,la socia el negoco de venta de pescado y pollo lo vende en el mercado desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de estos negocios la socia quiere salir adelante.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pollo y pescado.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues with her business buying and selling fish and chicken and also works in the business of growing corn.  She has farmland where she grows corn that she sells in various street markets.  She sells the chicken and fish in the market from 9am until 5pm and wants to move forward by means of these businesses.  She requests the loan to buy chicken and fish.  She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy chicken and fish.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: Luis de 24 años de edad, es casado, tiene 2 hijos que dependen de el, trabaja como Guarda de Seguridad para la Alcaldia. Solicita el credito para invertirlos en la construccion de un porche en la parte delantera de su casa y asi ir mejorando poco a poco su casita para que sus hijos cuenten con un lugar donde jugar sin peligro.
texts.en: Luis is 24 years old, married, and has two dependent children.  He works as a security guard for the council.  He is requesting this loan to invest in building a porch on the front of his house in order to gradually improve his small home so that his children have a place where they can play without danger.

loans.use: to build a porch

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José de 40 años de edad, inició su negocio de tienda desde hace 8 años, en otro barrio diferente del que ahora se encuentra; él había traído un dinero,  desde Santa Marta, ciudad vecina del departamento del Atlántico, ubicada a orillas del mar y también llamada “La Perla de América”, lugar donde lo había ahorrado recogiendo café,  su anterior trabajo.  Lo primero que hizo para emprender su aventura de negocios,  fue comprar  un enfriador,  vitrinas y surtirlas de víveres de la canasta familiar, para venderlos al detalle a las familias que  compran para el consumo diario. Poco a poco fue organizándose y tomando mucha experiencia, que trasladó a su actual negocio ubicado en otro barrio del mismo municipio, donde se mudó. Su mayor desafío es responder a su meta de emprender un punto alterno de tienda, que le genere nuevos ingresos, donde su hermano seria el administrador. En la actualidad tiene una competencia conformada por tres tiendas, que están ubicadas muy cerca a su negocio, pero su experiencia hace que pueda captar rápidamente la atención de sus clientes, ofreciéndole artículos a la medida de las posibilidades de su clientela y teniendo en su estantería de todo un poco de lo que la gente requiere, así como también, buscando oportunidades de lograr descuentos con sus compras en mayor volumen, como es lo que pretende  con un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará en mayor volumen, víveres, ranchos, refrescos, abarrotes, beneficiándose con los precios de compra que ofrecen sus proveedores y que le permiten trasladarlo al buen funcionamiento de su negocio.
texts.en:
José is 40, and started his store business eight years ago, in another neighborhood, different from the one he is in now.  He had brought a small a bit of money from Santa Marta, a neighboring city in Atlántico department, located by the sea. It is also called the "Pearl of America." This was where he had saved the money by picking coffee, his former work.

The first thing he did to launch his business was to buy a cooler and display cases, and stock them with basic household supplies, in order to sell them at retail to the families that buy for daily use. Little by little he organized himself and gained a great deal of experience, which he transferred to his current business, located in another neighborhood of the same municipality, where he had moved. 

His greatest challenge is to achieve his goal of launching a second store outlet, which his brother would run, in order to generate new income.

Currently, he has competition from three stores, which are located very close to his. But his experience enables him to quickly capture the attention of his customers, by offering them items tailored to his customers' means, and having on his shelves a bit of everything that people need. 

He does this as well by looking for opportunities to get discounts with his purchases in greater volume, which is what he expects to do with his credikiva, the first loan he is taking out from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. 

By means of the loan, he will buy in bulk: household supplies, snacks, soft drinks and groceries, benefitting from the purchase prices that his suppliers offer. He will be able to translate this into good performance for his business.

loans.use: To buy in greater volume, household supplies, snacks, soft drinks and groceries.

loans.name: Izatoy

texts.ru: Изатой трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Она занимается предпринимательством. После того как её супруг остался без работы, она решила искать работу, так как дети ещё были маленькими, их надо было обучить, кормить и одевать, а для этого нужны деньги. Изатой с тех пор начала заниматься бизнесом купле- продажей женских тапочек и обуви, на полученный прибыль она выдала дочерей замуж. Мужа отправила на заработки в Российской Федерации. Изатой запрашивает займ для покупки товара с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Izatoi is a hardworking and kind woman. She is married and has three children. Izatoi is an entrepreneur. After her husband became unemployed, she decided to look for work. The children were still small, but they needed an education, and an education requires money. Since then, Izatoi has been selling women's slippers and shoes. With the income she earned, she covered the expenses of her daughter's wedding. Her husband has been sent to do seasonal work in the Russian Federation. Izatoi is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Donath

texts.en: Donath is 41 years-old. He is married and has three children. With the loan, he wants to buy more clothes, a business he has been doing for the last ten years. The profits will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Gerturde

texts.en: Gerturde is 38 years-old. She wants the loan to buy more beans and sorghum to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Gunter Salvatore

texts.es:
GUNTER SALVATORE tiene 40 años de edad es divorciado tiene un hijo, vive solo en casa de unos familiares en guaranda provincia de Bolívar

GUNTER SALVATORE es cerrajero y soldador. Solicita el crédito para comprar barillas, soldadora. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los materiales que le hacen falta para trabajar mejor.

Las compras lo harán en Guaranda. 
El sueño es poder incrementar el negocio. En el tiempo libre le gusta bailar y parcticar el deporte en especial alzar pesas.
texts.en:
Gunter Salvatore is 40, divorced, and has one child. He lives alone in a family home in Guaranda, Bolivar province.
He is a locksmith and a welder. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of rods and a soldering iron. This loan will help him to buy the materials that he needs in order to work better.
He will make his purchases in Guaranda.
His dream is to be able to expand his business. In his free time, he enjoys dancing and playing sports, especially weightlifting.

loans.use: to buy rods and a soldering iron.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: Jaime de 27 años es la propietaria de la Tienda ubicada en el municipio de Puerto Colombia, a orillas del mar, lugar donde vive con su cónyuge y  sus dos hijos en las edades de 2 y 4 años.  Jaime desde muy joven, trabajó como ayudante de una tienda de propiedad de un comerciante natural del interior del país;   de su anterior jefe y de las tareas diarias que desempeñaba,  recopiló toda su experiencia, para 4 años después convertirla en su propio emprendimiento en un populoso sector de calles destapadas. Jaime afirma que tiene la suficiente experiencia y sensibilidad social para ofrecer un buen servicio y acomodar a todos los clientes que son de escasos recursos, pues él vende desde un tomate hasta media barra de jabón. Adicionalmente a la venta de víveres  los fines de semana vende cervezas, aprovechando el potencial turístico de su municipio y por ello da curso libre a la música compartida y enciende un potente equipo de sonidos y ubica en su terraza, mesas y sillas plásticas. El comenta que “curiosamente los hombres mas pobres,  son los que mas consumen licor los fines de semana, de ahí se cumple su refrán: “No hay borracho pobre ni cobarde” Jaime aspira a ampliar su negocio como en la venta de víveres como la de licores, por eso acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará víveres, carnes, abarrotes que le permitentener un capital de trabajo adicional con el cual comprar, mejorar el surtido y rotar mas rápidamente su mercancía, generando un poco mas de utilidades.
texts.en:
Jaime, age 27, owns a store located in the municipality of Puerto Colombia, on the shores of the sea. He lives with his wife and two children ages 2 and 4. At a very young age, Jaime started working as an assistant in a store owned by a merchant from the interior of the country. He gathered experience from his boss and his day-to-day work over four years. He then poured this experience into his own enterprise in a highly-populated sector with unpaved roads. Jaime says that he has enough experience and social understanding to offer a good service and accommodate customers who have scarce resources; he will sell just one tomato or a half bar of soap. On top of selling groceries, on the weekends he also sells beer, taking advantage of his municipality's tourist appeal. For this, he gives free rein for sharing music and turns on a powerful sound system, setting out plastic chairs and tables on his terrace. He says that "strangely, it is the poorest men who most consume liquor on the weekends; in keeping with the phrase, "No hay borracho pobre ni cobarde" ["There are no poor nor cowardly drunks"].
Jaime hopes to expand both his businesses. For this reason he is applying for a Kiva loan, his first loan from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, he will purchase groceries, meat, and supplies, which will allow him to have an additional working capital with which to buy stock, improve his stock, and rotate his merchandise more rapidly. This will generate him a slightly higher income.

loans.use: to buy groceries, meat, and supplies.

loans.name: Sayohat

texts.ru:
Саёхат добрая и трудолюбивая женщина, она замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 10 лет она занимается купле -продажей кураги и переработкой абрикосового сада. В бизнесе занимается одна. Ежегодно покупает сада абрикосовых деревьев с г. Худжанда около 1,5  га. 
 Муж занимается предоставлением услугу плотника, имеет доход от этой услуги. Саёхат кредитуется в «Имон Интернешнл» несколько лет,  имеет хорошую репутация и отличную кредитную историю. 
Саёхат  хотела бы получить займ  в размере  2 000 долларов США  для  приобретения сада абрикосовых деревьев с целью  переработки абрикоса.
texts.en: Sayokhat is a kind and hardworking woman; she is married and has two children. For more than ten years she has been selling dried apricots and processing harvests from apricot orchards. She works alone. Each year she buys apricot trees and rents 1.5 hectares of orchard space from the city of Khudzhand. Her husband is a carpenter, and earns an income providing carpentry services. Sayokhat has received loans from IMON International for several years, and has a good reputation and an excellent credit history. Sayokhat would like to receive a loan in the amount of 2000 dollars to purchase an orchard's worth of apricot trees to grow and process apricots.

loans.use: To purchase an apricot harvest

loans.name: Miech

texts.en:
Miech is a local farmer from Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. He is 23 years-old and married with a loving young child.
